name: Santa Claus - The Witch Hunter
description:
It's Christmas Eve and Hansel and Gretel are still out picking nuts and berries to fill their growling tummies.

Unbeknownst to them, the women that so warmly welcomed them in to their house to get out of the cold are actually witches in disguise. Inside the house, the children feasted to the glee of the cannibal witch who can't wait to sink her teeth in children stew!

Meanwhile Santa was doing a practice fly with his sleigh and reindeer when he saw the children in trouble.

Santa put his sleigh into turbo mode, immediately his festive sleigh is put into battle mode. A fierce battle ensued with the witches calling more of their sisters in darkness.


Who will win and tip the delicate balance of good and evil?
